page.title: 07TOURISM
page.content: Pontin's is a holiday camp which caters for the whole holiday. The land is leased by the Rother District Council. The capicity is 3,500 in self catering chalets, equipped with cooker,refrigerater, bathroom & T.V.The amenity block contains a restaurant,a snackbar & takeaway food bar, awell provisioned supermarket with good quality gifts, a cinema, the ballroom complex with competitions shows & bingo, entertainment for children & adults, and dowstairs a bar with nightly cabaret. There is also a games block with snooker, pool tables & dart boards, a splendid swimming pool & an outside sports field. the camp is open for 22 weeks in the year, with additional special interest weekends, a Christmas and an Easter holiday..
